title: Land with House in Kalubowila
details:
17 perches land with house (15 yrs old) for sale in hospital road, Kalubowila.
- 1.2Km to Nugegoda
- 3Km to Dehiwala.
- 400M to the Colombo South Hospital (Kalubowila)

** 4M per perch Or near offer will be considered.**

GENUINE BUYERS ONLY AND NO BROKERS PLEASE.
